si.title: ජනමත විචාරණය සිදු වේද?
body_lines: "රනිල් වික්රමසිංහ මහතා ජනාධිපතිවරණයට මුහුණ දීමට පසුබට නොවූයේ - ජනාධිපතිවරණය වසර දෙකක් තිස්සේ කල් දැමීමේ අදහස ඔහුගේ පක්ෂයෙන් මතුවෙන්නේ නැත"

en.title: Will the referendum take place?
body_lines: “If Ranil Wickremesinghe had not hesitated to face the presidential election- the idea of ​​postponing the presidential election for two years would not have emerged from his party"

summary_lines: If Ranil Wickremesinghe had contested the presidency without hesitation, his party wouldn't have proposed postponing the election for two years.
